extendedInfo.description: The lavenders are a genus of 39 species of flowering plants in the mint family, Lamiaceae. English lavender yields an essential oil with sweet overtones, and can be used in balms, salves, perfumes, cosmetics, and topical applications. Essential oil of lavender has antiseptic and anti-inflammatory properties. These extracts are also used as fragrances for bath products. Smell the wounder of this on your home screen as a Live Wallpaper in 3D cubes. We added lighting for that special feeling. Features include:Options for transparent box2 different light sourceOption to move lightOption to change viewing angle and change background color.Option for Auto rotation with speed control, or manual control with finger swipe.
